page.title: 13LEISURE IN THE AREA
page.content: Many people like to go to the North Kesteven Sports Centre at North Hykeham.They have a choice of swimming,judo,kung foo,karate,roller skating,gymnastics,popmobility,squash tennis,table tennis and badminton. For those who wish to spend their leisure time in the area there are over thirty clubs and societies to join,including a sports and social club at North Scarle. Both Eagle and North Scarle have good playing fields. For very young childran there are two mums and Toddlers Clubs and a play group at Eagle.For older children there are Youth Clubs,scouts,Girl Guides,cubs and Brownies.For older people there is a sunshine club at Eagle and two senior citizen clubs at North Scarle.
